definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to join/to fit/to mate/to mix/to match/to deserve/to make up (a prescription)/to allocate
mark/sign/talisman/to seal/to correspond to/tally/symbol/written charm/to coincide

sentences.english: It is sometimes tempting to use a bounded wildcard in the return type of a method.
sentences.chinese: 有时希望对方法的返回类型使用有界通配符。

sentences.english: In the above example, wildcards were used for supplying property values.
sentences.chinese: 在上面的示例中，通配符用于提供属性值。

sentences.english: I don't know any M33 member, and only know a few wildcard members.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道任何M33成员，并只知道几个通配符。

sentences.english: This parameter does not support wildcards.
sentences.chinese: 这个参数不支持通配符。

sentences.english: Finally, your connector needs to properly handle wildcards.
sentences.chinese: 最后，连接器需要正确地处理通配符。

sentences.english: Toggle metacharacter expansion of local file names.
sentences.chinese: 切换本地文件名的通配符扩展。

sentences.english: Obviously, only one of these two attributes is needed on a wildcard.
sentences.chinese: 显然，一个通配符上只需要这两个属性中的一个。

sentences.english: The '#' is a greedy wildcard and matches all topics to the right of it.
sentences.chinese: “#”是一个贪婪的通配符，匹配其右边的所有主题。

sentences.english: All of the tools support wildcard matching.
sentences.chinese: 所有的工具都支持通配符匹配。

sentences.english: This is caused by the wildcard matching more names than intended.
sentences.chinese: 这是由通配符匹配多个名称导致的。

sentences.english: You can also repeat glob operators as necessary.
sentences.chinese: 您还可以根据需要重复使用通配符匹配操作符。

sentences.english: which pushes the burden of dealing with bounded wildcards on your callers.
sentences.chinese: 这将处理有界通配符的工作推给了调用者。

sentences.english: Whitelist and blacklist addresses are now file-glob-style patterns, so friend@somewhere.com, *@isp.com, or *.domain.net
sentences.chinese: 白名单和黑名单都可以使用通配符。

sentences.english: In other words, you can think of it as a wildcard in your schema.
sentences.chinese: 换而言之，您可以把它当作您的模式中的通配符。

sentences.english: Concerning the script commands, wildcarded parameters should always be quoted.
sentences.chinese: 对于脚本命令，通配符参数应始终用引号括起来。

sentences.english: To do this simply, use a wildcard (*) in the path expression.
sentences.chinese: 为了简单起见，可以在路径表达式中使用一个通配符。
